title: Login not working
description: Users cannot log in with correct credentials. Authentication fails across devices, possibly due to identity service...

title: Invoice not generated
description: Monthly invoice failed to generate. Logs indicate premature process termination, possibly caused by billing...

title: Email notifications delayed

title: API rate limit issues
description: Customer experiences rate-limit errors despite low usage. Logs suggest incorrect counter resets or shared limits...

title: Dashboard loading slowly
description: Dashboard takes over 20 seconds to load. Backend API calls are slow, possibly caused by inefficient queries or large data widgets...

title: Password reset email not received
description: Password reset emails are not delivered. Emails appear queued but unprocessed, indicating possible SMTP or mail service issues...

title: Data sync failure
description: CRM data fails to sync across devices. Logs show timeouts and partial updates, likely caused by sync scheduler...

title: Subscription upgrade not reflecting
description: Plan upgrade processed, but account still shows old limits. Likely due to entitlement propagation failure or service delay...

title: Mobile app crashes
description: App crashes on Android 15 launch. Logs show null pointer exceptions, possibly due to API changes or missing permissions...

title: Incorrect report totals
description: Sales report totals differ from database records. Likely caused by caching issues, aggregation errors, or timezone discrepancies...

title: Two-factor authentication failing
description: 2FA codes not sent via SMS or email. Logs show no outgoing messages, suggesting MFA service malfunction or disabled triggers...

title: UI layout broken on Safari
description: Safari 18 shows overlapping UI elements. Likely caused by browser-specific CSS rendering differences requiring layout adjustments...
